entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@OppligerMichael "The National Institutes of Health abruptly cut off funding to a long-standing, well-regarded research project on bat coronaviruses only after the White House specifically told it to do so, according to Dr. Anthony Fauci."

https://t.co/DgjhpYs0dn
